subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|龹|手|t2=hand|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – a fist is a form of a hand.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{och-l|卷|to bent; to curve|id=1}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; also cf. {{zh-ref|Baxter and Sagart, 2014}}).
